response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This extraordinary item is not just a product; it's an experience tailored to elevate your lifestyle. Considering its unique features and unparalleled quality, we believe its value exceeds $800,000. For this exceptional opportunity, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $750,000. This is a special chance to own a masterpiece that is both a testament to craftsmanship and a significant investment in luxury. I look forward to your consideration and hope to discuss the details further with you.", "product_price": 750000}
